text: geudeul-eun geudeul apdwilo pyeolchyeojyeo issneun haneulgwa daejileul boji mosham-i nyo man-il hananim-i wonhandamyeon geubun eun daejilo hayeogeum geudeul-eul samkido log hageona haneul-eul jogagnaeeo geudeul wie tteol-eojige halila sillo geu an-eneun hananimkke hoegaehaneun modeun jong-eul wihan yejung-i issnola
